data.name: Pinball Arcade: Season Five Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get all ELEVEN Season Five pinball tables for the discounted price of $29.99 (40% off the normal price).

Tables Included: The Getaway: High Speed II™, F-14 Tomcat™, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein™, No Fear: Dangerous Sports™, Judge Dredd™, Fireball™, El Dorado™, Hurricane™, Rescue 911™, Last Action Hero®, TX-Sector™
data.about_the_game:
Get all ELEVEN Season Five pinball tables for the discounted price of $29.99 (40% off the normal price).

Tables Included: The Getaway: High Speed II™, F-14 Tomcat™, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein™, No Fear: Dangerous Sports™, Judge Dredd™, Fireball™, El Dorado™, Hurricane™, Rescue 911™, Last Action Hero®, TX-Sector™
data.short_description: Get all ELEVEN Season Five pinball tables for the discounted price of $29.99 (40% off the normal price). Tables Included: The Getaway: High Speed II™, F-14 Tomcat™, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein™, No Fear: Dangerous Sports™, Judge Dredd™, Fireball™, El Dorado™, Hurricane™, Rescue 911™, Last Action Hero®,...
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Lion or Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
